channel.title: Steve Griffith - Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content on Steve Griffith - Ramblings

item.description: So, Who Am I? Iâ€™m just another teenager who likes writing, programming and making stuff. Even setting the title as Who Am I for this article is reminding me of whoami in Linux. I feel the inner urge to contribute something to the Internet because I love writing and I believe posting something online enables users all around the globe to see your work and suggest improvements. Recently I’ve also started taking interest in web designing and hosting the fruitful results of which these site and blogs are!
